author: arj
msg: JDBCUserDatabase gets basic support for inserting an "initial role" row into a admin-defined roles table. This is designed to enable JSPWiki to serve as an enrollment mechanism for container-managed users, in those cases where the container and JSPWiki share user information. A future set of commits will include adjustments to WikiPermission, UserManager and UserPreferences to support this functionality. We do *not* envison broader role management capabilities for JDBCUserDatabase, other than just this initial role row insert support.

author: arj
msg: Bug fix: InputValidator's validate() was rejecting null or blank strings as invalid. This is incorrect behavior, and these values now validate. Note that the validateNotNull() method should be used if checking for blank/null strings is required.

author: arj
msg: Bug fix: XMLUserDatabase now commits using proper UTF-8. It was not doing so previously, in spite of an XML header that suggested otherwise.

author: jalkanen
msg: Now creates a clone of the original param array before storing it.
